title: E-commerce Website
description: Developed a responsive e-commerce platform using React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and Express, improving user engagement by 20% and ensuring seamless experiences across devices. Integrated a secure payment gateway and optimized the checkout process, reducing cart abandonment rates by 15%.
